name: Manj Musik
description: '''Manjeet Singh Ral''' ([[Punjabi language|Punjabi]]: ਮਨਜੀਤ ਸਿੰਘ ਰਾਲ, born 24 August 1984), better known by his stage-name '''Manj Musik''', is a [[British Indian]] composer, singer and [[Filmi]] scorer. He was one of the music composer for the [[Bhangra (music)|bhangra]] music group [[RDB (band)|RDB]], which was formed with his two brothers Surjeet Singh (SurjRDB) and Kuldeep Ral in 2001.
